document_data.name: Thesp Eltorchul
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Thesp Eltorchul''' was a [[noble]] inhabiting [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Thesp was the patriarch of the [[Eltorchul]] noble family. Upon inheriting his family's wealth from the spice trade, Thesp invested a large sum of money into establishing the [[Eltorchul Academy]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. In addition to educating young [[wizard]]s, the Academy procured rare [[spell component]]s. Thesp was forced to be far less discriminating on who was admitted to Eltorchul Academy or risk complete bankruptcy following a magical accident involving his son and heir, [[Oth Eltorchul]].
document_data.Relationships: Thesp's younger daughter, [[Fea Eltorchul]], became his heir apparent following Oth's accident.
